choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today presuming no dietary restrictions.
Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries, chia seeds and almond milk
Snack: Apple slices with peanut butter
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and a light vinaigrette dressing
Snack: Greek yogurt with granola and honey
Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and steamed vegetables (broccoli, carrots)
